entry.title: WIND WARNING , Malahat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malahat 9:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.1°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low 7 except temperature steady near 10 near the water.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near Haro Strait overnight. Low 7 except temperature steady near 10 near the water. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Juan de Fuca Strait early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight then becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
